mapper.select: select date_format(a1.work_event_time, '%Y-%u') as `c_name`, sum(if(a0.value = '24小时内', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value0`, sum(if(a0.value = '48小时内', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value1`, sum(if(a0.value = '超48小时', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value2` from work_event_property a0 join work_event a1 on a0.work_event_id = a1.id where a0.name = 'timeliness' group by c_name order by c_name;

select date_format(a1.work_event_time, '%Y-%u') as `c_name`, sum(if(a0.value = 'true', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value0`, sum(if(a0.value = 'false', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value1` from work_event_property a0 join work_event a1 on a0.work_event_id = a1.id where a0.name = 'intercept' group by c_name order by c_name;

select date_format(a1.work_event_time, '%Y-%u') as `c_name`, sum(if(a0.value = 'true', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value0`, sum(if(a0.value = 'false', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value1` from work_event_property a0 join work_event a1 on a0.work_event_id = a1.id where a0.name = 'solve' group by c_name order by c_name;

select date_format(a1.work_event_time, '%Y-%u') as `c_name`, sum(if(a0.value = 'false', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value0`, sum(if(a0.value = 'true', a1.work_event_cnt, 0)) as `value1` from work_event_property a0 join work_event a1 on a0.work_event_id = a1.id where a0.name = 'fault' group by c_name order by c_name;
